meanings.sent1: The pling of the metal bell echoed through the room.
meanings.sent2: I heard a pling as the metal spoon fell on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The pling of the coins in his pocket made him feel rich.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a joyful pling in the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The pling of the hammer hitting the metal was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: To make a light, ringing sound
meanings.sent1: She plings the triangle to start the music class.
meanings.sent2: The wind chime plings softly in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The raindrops pling on the window, creating a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent4: His voice plings with excitement as he talks about his favorite hobby.
meanings.sent5: The small pebbles pling as they hit the water surface.

meanings.definition: A sudden burst of noise or sound
meanings.sent1: The unexpected pling of the fire alarm startled everyone.
meanings.sent2: A loud pling broke the silence of the night.
meanings.sent3: The pling of the balloon popping made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The pling of the champagne bottle signaled the start of the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The pling of the car horn made him jump in surprise.
